pdf-pager.PageOffset.Label: Page Offset
pdf-pager.Code.Label: PDF Code
pdf-pager.Error.NoPDFWithCode: Unable to find PDF with specified code.
pdf-pager.Error.FailedLoadPage: Failed to load page for PDF with specified code.
pdf-pager.Warning.ThingDeleted: '%1' displayed in an open PDF Page has been deleted
pdf-pager.alwaysLoadPdf.Name: Immediately Display PDF
pdf-pager.alwaysLoadPdf.Hint: When checked, then PDFs will be immediately displayed when their page is selected, removing the need to press the 'Load PDF' button
pdf-pager.dropPdfLink.Name: Create @PDF link on drop
pdf-pager.dropPdfLink.Hint: When a journal PDF page is dropped into another document, create a @PDF[journalname#pagename|page=1]{pagename} link instead of a @UUID link
pdf-pager.formFillPdf.Name: Support Form-Fillable PDFs
pdf-pager.formFillPdf.Hint: Enable the use of Form-Fillable PDFs as an alternative to Actor sheets
pdf-pager.actorConfig.Name: Field Mappings for Actors
pdf-pager.actorConfig.Hint: Define a Javascript object that contains a mapping between PDF field and ACTOR field, such as: { "Character_Name" : "name", "health" : "system.health.hp" }
pdf-pager.itemConfig.Name: Field Mappings for Items
pdf-pager.itemConfig.Hint: Define a Javascript object that contains a mapping between PDF field and ITEM field, such as: { "Name" : "name", "health" : "system.health.hp" }
pdf-pager.hideFieldBg.Name: Hide Editable Field BG
pdf-pager.hideFieldBg.Hint: Disable the setting of an explicit background colour for editable fields (overrides a default PDFJS styling)
pdf-pager.actorType.Name: Code for Actor '%1'
pdf-pager.actorType.Hint: Define the PDF CODE of the PDF page to be used when selecting 'Show in PDF' from the Actor context menu
pdf-pager.itemType.Name: Code for Item '%1'
pdf-pager.itemType.Hint: Define the PDF CODE of the PDF page to be used when selecting 'Show in PDF' from the Item context menu
pdf-pager.actorSheet.Name: PDF to use for Actor '%1'
pdf-pager.actorSheet.Hint: Choose the PDF file to be used for a '%1' Actor
